name: Parcel Issue Receipt Tracking Report
query:
SELECT 
    DATE(tpir.creation) AS Date,
    tpir.name AS "Parcel_No:Link/VG_Parcel_Issue_Receipt:100", 
    tpir.parcel_type AS Parcel_Type,
    tpir.send_recive AS Send_Receive,
    tem.emp_name AS Sender_Name,
    tbm.branch_short_name AS Sender_Branch,
    tsm.supplier_name AS Sender_Supplier,
    tbm1.branch_short_name AS Receiver_Branch,
    tsm1.supplier_name AS Receiver_Supplier,
    tpir.receiver_emp_name AS Receiver_Name,
    tpir.parcel_receive_by_name ,
    tpir.remarks AS Remarks
FROM 
    `tabVG_Parcel_Issue_Receipt` tpir 
LEFT JOIN `tabEmp_Mst` tem ON tem.name = tpir.sender_emp_name 
LEFT JOIN `tabSupplier_Master` tsm ON tsm.name = tpir.sender_supplier 
LEFT JOIN `tabBranch_Master` tbm ON tbm.name = tpir.sender_branch
LEFT JOIN `tabBranch_Master` tbm1 ON tbm1.name = tpir.receiver_branch
LEFT JOIN `tabSupplier_Master` tsm1 ON tsm1.name = tpir.receiver_supplier 
WHERE 
    tpir.parcel_type = 'Outside'
    AND tpir.send_recive = 'Receive'
    AND (
        (tpir.vg_voucher_no IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(tpir.vg_voucher_no) <> '' 
         AND (tpir.app_diamond IS NULL OR TRIM(tpir.app_diamond) = '' OR tpir.app_diamond <> 1))
        OR
        (tpir.vou_gold IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(tpir.vou_gold) <> '' 
         AND (tpir.app_gold IS NULL OR TRIM(tpir.app_gold) = '' OR tpir.app_gold <> 1))
        OR
        (tpir.vou_silver IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(tpir.vou_silver) <> '' 
         AND (tpir.app_silver IS NULL OR TRIM(tpir.app_silver) = '' OR tpir.app_silver <> 1))
    )
  or  (tpir.receiver_emp_name IS NULL OR tpir.receiver_emp_name = '')
